# References & Building the Documentation {.unnumbered}

## Building the Documentation

This documentation is built using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), a modern open-source scientific and technical publishing system.

### Requirements

To build this documentation, you need:

1. [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/getting-started/installation.html) (latest version recommended)
2. Python 3.7+
3. Optional: VSCode with Quarto extension for interactive editing

### Building the HTML Book

```bash
cd makara_docs
quarto render
```

This will create a `_book` directory with the HTML output.

### Previewing with Live Reload

```bash
cd makara_docs
quarto preview
```

This will start a local server and open the documentation in your browser. The documentation will automatically refresh when you make changes to the source files.

### Building PDF Output

```bash
cd makara_docs
quarto render --to pdf
```

## Extending the Documentation

### Adding New Pages

1. Create a new `.qmd` file in the project directory
2. Add the file to the `chapters` section in `_quarto.yml`
3. Rebuild the documentation

### Including Code Examples

```{python}
#| eval: false
# This is an example code block
import numpy as np
from mav_simulator.class_vessel import Vessel

# Create vessel
vessel = Vessel(vessel_params, hydro_data, vessel_id=1)
```
